subject: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
Internal Audit, Monitoring, Consulting and Investigations Division
From Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahlenius.
UNITED NATIONS SCAM VICTIMS COMPENSATIONS PAYMENTS.
From Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahlenius.

Attention; MR Gerald


This is to bring to your notice that  After i was Retired from this office
i was appointed again and  I am
delegated from the United Nations To Central Bank to pay 150 scam
victims $5,000,000.00 (five MILLION UNITED STATE DOLLAR) each.

You are listed and approved for this payment as one of the scammed victims
to be paid this amount, get back to meas soon as possible for the immediate
payments of your five,000,000.00 compensations funds. On this faithful
recommendations,we want you to know that during the last U.N. meetings held
at Abuja, Nigeria, it was alarmed so much by the world in the meetings on
the lose of funds by various individuals to the scams artists operating in
syndicates all over the world today.

In other to compensate victims, the U.N Body in conjunction with the
Nigerian Government is now paying 150 victims of this operators
$5,000,000.00 each in accordance with the U.N. recommendations. Due to the
corrupt and inefficient Banking Systems in Nigeria, the payments are to be
supervised by the United Nations' Officials and the Central Bank of Nigeria
as the corresponding paying treasury department United Bank for Africa
According to the number of applicants at hand, 114 Beneficiaries has been
paid,half of the victims are from the United States, we still have more 36
left to be paid the compensations of $5millon each.

Your particulars was mentioned by one of the Syndicates who was arrested as
one of their victims of the operations, you are hereby  warned not to
communicate or duplicate this message to him for any reason what so ever as
the U.S. secret service is already on trace of the other criminals. Other
victims who have not been contacted can submit their application as well
for scrutiny and possible consideration.

You are thereby advised to contact the payment officer of the treasury
department United Bank of Africa through
the following information.

Name........................MR PETER UGO ,

Email:.........................u365648@gmail.com



WhatsApp number +234 8132291009


You will receive your compensations payments through which the options You
will be detailed with the modalities as
you contact the private officer of the treasury department United Bank of
Africa


Sincerely yours,
Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahlenius

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
Hello Ahlenius,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected piece of news. Could you please provide more details about how my name was mentioned and by whom? Also, could you explain a bit more about the process of receiving these funds?

I'm curious to know how the United Nations got involved in this matter. Is there any official documentation or website where I can verify this information?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
ATTN.Gerald


This is to confirm the receipt of your mail. This fund valued at US$5
Million dollars is a scammed victim compensation financial grant which is
awarded to a few selected scam victims of which your name is among those
that will benefit from this payment exercise.

You are therefore required to provide us with the below needed detail as we
have started all necessary documentations towards the release of your funds
of US$10 Millions dollars.

1, Your Full name
2, Your current address
3, Your mobile phone number
4, Name of your next of kin
5 Your means of identification

We expect to hear from you soon.
Best reagrds,
Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahlenius

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
Hello Ahlenius,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this financial grant. Could you please provide more details about how my name was selected for this? 

Also, I'm curious to know more about the process involved in releasing these funds. What steps are necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
ATTN.mr Gerald

If you are a scam victim I will advise you to contact the paying bank so
that they can tell you on how to receive the compensation.

bellow is the information of the paying bank

You are thereby advised to contact the payment officer of the treasury
department United Bank of Africa through
the following information.

Name........................MR PETER UGO ,

Email:.........................u365648@gmail.com

WhatsApp number +234 8132291009

We wait to hear from you.



Sincerely yours,
Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahleniu

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
Hello Ahleniu,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the treasury department of the United Bank of Africa. I'm curious, could you tell me more about how this process works? And who is Peter Ugo? Is he a representative of the bank?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: From Mrs.Inga-Britt Arrhenius
body:
Attn  ; mr Gerald ,

Good Morning,

This is a response to your email on how you are going to get your Money by
ATM CARD.

We have been instructed by the United Nations to issue you ATM CARD Worth
of  $5,000,000 usd (five Million United States Dollars)  been your
compensation fund as one of the scam victims.

We have our  payment  options which is either you come here for the
 signing of your payment release order as the beneficiary of the fund,but
if you can not come here due to the present Covid-19 Pandemic condition
around the world now, which means we will send your ATM card through
 government accredited courier company   of which  you will take care of
the dispatch fee.

As soon as we hear from you on which option you choose, we will then
proceed on how to send it and inform you of what it will cost.

You are to send to us  your full information , which are your full name,
address, working telephone number, occupation and an identity copy , to
enable us process and faciliate your details in getting your ATM card ready
in your name.

Your response will enable us to advise you much better.
Regards,

From Mrs.Inga-Britt Ahlenius.
